metadata.description: All learnable spells organized by magical tradition (Pathfinder 2e style)

arcane.description: Study-based magic: raw power, force, transmutation

items.name: Ray of Frost
items.description: Blast of cold damages and slows

items.name: Levitate
items.description: Float up or down at will

divine.description: Faith-based magic: healing, protection, holy power

occult.description: Mental and psychic magic: mind control, fear, illusions
